summary: Replaces gerdas appearance with this follower:  https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80540
descriptionHtml:
Makes gerda into lucila. Couldn't find a decent gerda replacer myself out there. So I used this follower mod: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80540
And NPC Visual tranfer tools to make this.
author: romaera
